alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 10:28PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Geauga, northeastern Cuyahoga, Lake and Ashtabula Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1028 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles northwest of Timberlake to 9 miles northwest of Lakeline to 10 miles west of Euclid. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Euclid, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Andover, Timberlake, Lakeline and Wickliffe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake
